title: This Week in Tech: An Electronic Repair Stand, Rad Power Bikes Adds Apple Location Tracking, and New Alloy Wheels
content:
FasCat's AI coaching adds some motivation, new Fulcrum alloy wheels, and Tailwind's high-carb mix is available now.
